org.spongepowered.api.entity.player

Interface Player

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ArmorEquipable, Carrier, CommandSource, DataHolder, DataSerializable, Entity, Equipable, Human, Identifiable, Living, LocatedSource, ProjectileSource, Subject, Tamer, User, Viewer

    public interface Player
extends Human, User, LocatedSource, Viewer
    A Player represents the in-game entity of a human playing on a server. This is in contrast to User which represents the storage and data associated with a Player.

    Any methods called on Player that are not on User do not store any data that persists across server restarts.
